text: Ezɨ gumazir dapanir kaba atara ghaze, “Nɨ anemadaghtɨ a uamategh mangɨ nguibar nɨ a ganɨngizimɨn ikɨ. Nɨ aneteghtɨ an e ko mangɨ mɨsoghan kogham. A mɨdorozim bagh mangɨva, uan nɨghnɨzim giragh, e mɨsueghtɨ e arɨghiregham. Devit kamaghɨn damightɨ, Atrivim Sol ua tuavir kamɨn a gakongɨva a gifuegham.
